content: try this easy to follow crochet scrunchie pattern that includes detailed step by step instructions with many photos this crochet hairtie pattern will help you make your own crochet hair accessory with confidence so don t hesitate and get started now and remember that i am happy to provide support with any of my crochet patterns if needed happy crocheting details - available only in english using us crochet terms - skill level beginner crochet skills and knowledge - finished size this will vary depending on the size of the hair tie used and yarn weight my scrunchie is 9cm 3 5 inches outside diameter this crochet scrunchie pattern consists of - step by step pattern descriptions including lots of photos for guidance - information about materials and equipment needed - list of abbreviations used in the pattern materials needed - this pattern will work nicely with 100% cotton 100% acrylic or a blend i recommend using this weight fine sport #2 = 4 ply or light worsted #3 = dk i used - fine sport #2 = 4 ply - 55% cotton and 45% acrylic blend - 1x ball of multicoloured yarn - yarnart jeans colour 80 - 50g/160m or - 1x ball of dark purple yarn - yarnart jeans colour 62 - 50g/160m or - 1x ball of light purple yarn - yarnart jeans colour 62 - 50g/160m equipment needed - crochet hook i used 3mm = c/2 but refer to the instructions on your yarn label if using different weight of yarn - hair tie you can use a hair tie of any size or thickness i recommend choosing either a smaller and thicker hair tie that you wrap around your hair just once or a bigger but thinner hair tie that you can wrap around your hair multiple times i used a smaller and thicker tie - 4 5cm 1 75 inches outside diameter - scissors - yarn needle you may sell the crochet items you made using this crochet scrunchie pattern as long as you credit me as the original designer
